channel.title: home
channel.description: Living and working around technology should improve life, not make it more complicated. That’s our goal.

item.title: MacLoc
item.description: MacLoc is the perfect solution for a busy work environment as well as at home where wandering hands can create a bothersome reduction in productivity. This simple application activates the Fast User Switching feature built-in to Mac OS X. After activating MacLoc in the menu bar, it will appear that you've logged out, however upon entering your username and password, all open documents and applications will be right where you left them. MacLoc is the perfect solution when you need to step away from your computer for a moment.

item.title: Binary Earth Screensaver
item.description:
Inspired by a futuristic movie trilogy which will remain unnamed as to not infringe upon any copyright issues with those who hold the rights to the films. Let us just say the if we were to use a numerical Matrix combining the directional vectors of a moving object with inertial forces, which may need to be Reloaded into the system, the result would show a graphical analysis of the total Revolutions of the body in motion.

Compatible with OS X 10.6 or later

item.title: Trench Run Screensaver
item.description:
This is a rendering of the epic X-Wing and a TIE Fighter chase down the trench of the Death Star from the original Star Wars! This is an excerpt from the “A New Hope” screen saver which depicts a greater portion of the battle at Yavin where the Rebellion fights to destroy the dreaded Dearth Star.

Compatible with OS X 10.6 or later
